Job Description: - Check and review all disbursed loan document from branches and credit operations team regarding the approved terms and conditions to ensure compliance with the Bank’s policies/procedures.- Review and utilize credit document checklist against supporting documents (Signature, Terms and Conditions, and other required fields) and proper filing of clients’ files.Daily review Loan Utilization Monitoring and prepare a list for sending to branches for further actions.- Regularly track and follow up with Branches of Client List in order to obtain a confirmed result of Loan Utilization.- Obtain a confirmed letter/report to verify the correctness of Loan Utilization and input such confirmed status into database and keep a letter/report in client files.- Monitor loan insurance policies to alert loan officers to renew before expiration date as well as minimize risk associated with expired insurance.- Review Terms and Conditions of approved loans based on committee resolution for special cases as well as properly track the input data.- Work closely with Legal Team and Branches on Soft Title collateral changed to/replaced with strong title to ensure legal agreement is served as references.- Check and review regularly of disbursement accounts to prevent any unsatisfactory in order to inform branches to take immediate actions.- Regularly follow up with branches as well as update to line manager of poor performing account in order to reach resolution.- Monitor monthly Loan Customer Audit report in order to remind branches and ensure client annual review is taken placed by branches following the Bank’s policies.- Monthly and/or quarterly review monthly-overdraft turnover and average maximum unused overdraft.- Prepare monthly and quarterly credit monitoring report to line manager.Perform other tasks as assigned from Line Manager.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree in Finance and Banking, Economics, Business Administration, or related fields.- Minimum one year of working experiences in credit, administration, or any relevant experiences.- Basic understanding of banking rules, regulations, compliance and risk management.- Good document preparation, filing and administration.- Good Interpersonal skills, communication, follow-up, and people handling skills.- Good negotiation, convincing, problem solving skills.- Strong attention to details, patience and process-oriented attributes.- Ability to use Microsoft Word, Excel, and Outlook.- Ability to use and communicate in both Khmer and English.
Company Profile: ABA Bank is Cambodia's leading private financial institution (not state-owned enterprise) founded in 1996 as the Advanced Bank of Asia Limited.In over 25 years of development and growth, ABA has significantly strengthened its position in the market and broke into the Top 3 commercial banks of the country. Today, ABA offers the entire spectrum of services to customer segments covering SMEs, micro businesses, and individuals.With 81 branches, 450+ ATMs, 480+ self-banking machines across the country, and advanced online banking and mobile banking platforms ABA Bank reaches out to a large number of customers with an array of modern financial services.

Job Description:
Position Objective
overall purpose of the role: Sales Executive must implement the company’s strategy and direction to achieve company goal and responsibility with your sales target every monthly.

Roles & Responsibilities
- Product presentation and demonstrate all products to customers retail and corporate
- Work closely with technical and Service advisor
- Explore the needs from corporate and wholesaler

Company Profile:
Iron Motors Co., Ltd is the automotive subsidiary owned and operated by the holding group, Iron Capital Plc. Over the past 20 years, our Co-Founders have been servicing premium and luxury car owners ranging from Bentley, Rolls Royce, Lamborghini in the luxury sector, and pinnacle companies in the premium sector like Mercedes, Lexus, Land Rover and BMW.
As serious automotive industry entrepreneurs, as well as passionate car owners, they have resolved to fix this existing problem and pursue to represent an official car dealership themselves. It is their honest believe that their domestic and international experience can be better used to represent a luxury and and focus on Premium car segment brand in Cambodia without sacrificing the heritage, tradition and values of the brand.
Iron Motors was born as part of a changing movement to improve the standards and benchmark in the automotive industry of Cambodia while the country reinvents itself to be more competitive on a global stage. We are committed to provide local consumers a premium and trusted car brand in the near and long term future..
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  017 928 688 info@ironmotors.asia Building No.63, Street K5, Toul Sangke, Ruesey Keo, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 12105 017 928 688

Job Description:
Position Objective
HR & Admin Supervisor is responsible for leading the HR & Admin Officer, overseeing activities of professional HR & Admin in term of monitoring the work performance. This position is to define and communicate the business’s KPIs and targets to the team member on a regular basis, analyze patterns of working behavior, and subsequently define data-driven action strategies in order to consistently optimize the business’s commercial performance.

Roles & Responsibility
** The recruitment:
• To work closely with Head of Department for manpower planning;
• To double check with Head of Department for the updated Job Description with clear main responsibilities and job requirement;
• To build good relationship with target school, Universities and Training Center who can provide the young and good talents candidates;
• To ensure the recruitment on time with the right candidate.
• Prepared Recruitment & Staff

** Orientation & Staffs on Boarding
• Provide Orientation to new employees on their first day of working.
• Introduce new joiner to their HoD and related department.
• Ensure that HoD provided conduct on job training to the new joiner.

** The performance management:
• To work with head of department for setting up the employee performance (objectives during and after probation);
• To provide the guideline and orientation to head of department on how to conduct and lead the performance evaluation;
• To keep remind to head of department for preparing and conducting the performance evaluations to team member and submit to HR department on time.

** Operation
• Ensure laptop, phone, stationaries and uniform are prepared for new employees.
• Keep updating assets (laptop, phone…) movement.

** The weekly Report:
• To ensure the weekly report is on time as per deadline;
• To assist the management meeting as the minute taker;
• Others work assigned by line manager.

** The leadership:
• To support the HR & Admin Officer in term of improving the work performance;
• To keep motivate the HR & Admin Officer and ensure the career development growth.

Job Description:
1. Prepares payment by verifying documentation, and requesting disbursement.
2. Manage and review client billing and collections.
3. Ensuring account receivable are collect timely.
4. Monthly reconcile accounts payable and receivable.
5. Monthly reconcile bank statement.
6. Prepare monthly tax return.
7. Ensuring all transaction accounting are compliance with accounting and tax laws.
8. Keep up to date for any new role and procedure from GDT, ACAR, NSFF or other ministry that related.
9. Manage petty cash and staff expense.  
10. Manage inventory asset and reconciling, adjusting if any variance.
11. Ensure monthly closing are timely and accurately.
12. Compare actual expense against with budget.
13. Assist budget preparation.
14. Assist annual tax return, annual financial declaration for non- audit required to submit to accounting and auditing regulation department.  
15. Another task as assign by manager.
Job Requirement:
• At least 1-2 years of finance accounting or similar field required.
• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance required.
• Knowledge of Ms. Word, Excel.
• Honest and trustworthy, hard-working and willing to learn.
• High attention to detail, excellent organizational skills.
• Knowledge of QuickBooks, SAP, Xero or similar accounting software is a plus.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. Job Description:
1. Daily costing operation supporting
-Daily operation supporting with document attached and follow up and record subcontractor
-Update posting report BOM & BOQ
-Review receipts and compare with actual charges to detect inaccuracies
-Cost pricing / invoicing of inventory to related parties
-Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project started
-Inventory costing, including construction material and tool
2. Closed monthly cost report
-Posting cost report in system timely basic
-Spot check document attached and record to make sure it corrected
-Posting subcontractor and reconcile data posted both manual and system
-Coordinated in monthly physical stock count, input and reconcile with warehouse.
-Ensure monthly cost of goods sold by project accurate
-Weekly spot check stock movement at all project.
-Report discrepancy and coach warehouse supervisor/manager to do the stock count
-Coordinate to get month-end stock balance from all project by 3rd of the month. 
-Verify and input into system for month-end cost calculation.
-Labor cost control by project and allocate cost with job card.
-Closed tool movement report by timely.
-Provide variance report for subcontractor and worker by monthly.
3. Other cost report supporting
-Support management for other reporting
-Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project
-Report to ACM the inventory/subcontractor reconciles sub ledger with G/L
-Other tasks assigned by Cost Account Manager
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor Degree in Accounting or other related fields.
-At least 3 years of experience in managing inventory and costing in the system and fixed assets
-Be proficient in excel skill
-Good communication and analytical skill
-Be patient, self-motivated and team building
-Willing to stay to complete all the work assigned during tough deadline.


Benefits:
- Seniority
- KPI Bonus
- Phone Allowance
- Annual leave
- Sick Leave
- Special Leave
- Public holidays (Labor Law)

Job Description:
-Maintaining the billing system.

-Positive mind set and willing to challenge with new things.

-Work well under pressure to meet the deadline.

Job Description: ●	Establishes internal controls and guidelines for accounting transactions and budget preparation.●	Prepare business activity reports, financial forecasts, and annual budgets. Oversees the production of periodic financial reports; ensures that the reported results comply with generally accepted accounting principles or financial reporting standards.●	Responsible for tax planning throughout the fiscal year; files annual corporate tax return.●	Evaluating, developing, and improving department controls, systems, and procedures that increase accuracy and efficiency.●	Manage and oversee the daily operations of the accounting department including: weekly, monthly and yearly closing process, accounts payable/receivable, general ledger, payroll and utilities, treasury, budgeting cash forecasting, revenue and expenditure variance analysis, capital assets reconciliations, trust account statement reconciliations, check runs, fixed asset activity & debt activity.●	Monitor and analysis accounting data and produce financial reports or statements including relevant journals, daily revenue reports and timely submission, reports must comply with the company’s adopted methods and measures in recognition of revenue and expenses for all financial transactions. Reporting functions based on established accounting standards and accepted practices in hotel accounting.●	To work closely with the Payroll Officer/ General Cashier to ensure proper administration of payroll matters. This includes payroll computation, payment, maintenance and administration of payroll fund (where applicable), and distribution of monthly salary.●	Attend weekly Hotel meetings and briefings as required & provide recommendations.●	Responsible to review receiving procedures and report inconsistencies and problems encountered during provision loading and seek solutions to these with relevant departments.●	Establish and enforce proper accounting methods, policies and principles, assign projects and direct staff to ensure compliance and accuracy to meet financial accounting objectives.●	To provide value-added feedback and advise to other departments in identifying methods and measures that could promote efficiency, increase cost savings and reduce pilferage. ●	Prepare exception reports on charges incurred by staffs on entertainment, complimentary F&B, or any other goods and services provided complimentary in normal course of business.●	Assist and support other departments (Operations) to draft, review and implement operating policy and procedures related to Finance. ●	Establish and maintain fiscal files and records to document transactions. Calculating and filing corporate tax returns for the company to the local nation’s revenue authorities.●	Evaluating a company’s financial transactions to ensure they comply with generally accepted accounting principles●	Fix office hours, maintain safety and cleanliness of workplace and scheduling of Finance subordinate staffs work shifts. ●	Assist with audit process and implement audit findings. Coordinate and complete annual audits●	Auditing accounts to ensure they comply with the company’s policy regulations and the nation’s laws. Improve systems and procedures and initiate corrective actions. ●	Review the systems and propose the necessary exception reports to ensure all abnormalities are noted and explained.●	Ensure that all finance staffs are guided to meet the company’s grooming standards and basic hygiene requirements and to abide by the code of conduct as laid out in company handbook. ●	To perform any other duties as assigned by the Finance Director.The above duties and responsibilities shall be reviewed and changed from time to time to suite for the success of the smooth running of the aforesaid job.
Job Requirement: ● BA degree major in finance, accounting. EXPERIENCE:● At least 3-5 years or above experience in related industry
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  015 899 012 (Telegram: 015 899 012) kathy.tan688@gmail.com 73t, Street 350, Khan Reussey Keo, Phnom Penh. 015 899 012 (Telegram: 015 899 012)

Job Description:
- Provide engineering needs for plan/spec and design/build projects to meet requirement
- Ensure designs meet all applicable codes and safety standards
- Define VE opportunities of existing designs
- Research new technical developments for implementation at CMLD
- Provide technical assistance to other design groups as necessary
- Prepared of Plan, BOQ, specification, method statement and comparison list.
- Analyze the models to produce a safe, economical design that satisfies the design criteria.
- Requires interaction with own MEP and other discipline to complete design tasks.
- Visit site patrol to ensure the work are being carried out as layout plan.
- Problem solving with site and design 
- Coordinate with related design parties to ensure that the layout plan is ready to use before issue to site.
Job Requirement:
- At least two-year experience 
- Knowledge of MEP Engineering
- Knowledge of International Standard Code
- Advanced level in Excel and PowerPoint, Autocad 2D and 3D, Dailux, Ecodial. 
- Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

job title: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិផ្នែកលក់​( ក្រចេះ  ស្វាយរៀង ស្ទឹងត្រែង ត្បូងឃ្មុំ)
position: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិផ្នែកលក់​( ក្រចេះ  ស្វាយរៀង ស្ទឹងត្រែង ត្បូងឃ្មុំ)
Job Description: •	អនុវត្តតាមផែនការ និង គោលដៅដែលសាមីប្រធានបានផ្តល់ឲ្យ•	គ្រប់គ្រង និង រៀបចំគម្រោងផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃសម្រាប់ការចុះជួបភ្នាក់ងារ លី ហួរ វេលុយ ក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិរបស់ខ្លួន•	បង្រៀននិងបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលដល់ភ្នាក់ងារពីរបៀបក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនវេរលុយ (mPOS) ព្រមទាំងផលិតផលនិងសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន •	រៀបចំផែនការជ្រើសរើសភ្នាក់ងារថ្មីៗ នៅក្នុងតំបន់យុទ្ធសាស្ត្រសំខាន់ៗដែលបានដាក់ចេញពីសាមីប្រធាន និងជាគោលដៅរួមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន•	ប្រមូលនូវរាល់ពត៌មានពីទីផ្សារ និង អតិថិជនដើម្បីស្វែងរកដំណោះស្រាយនិងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រថ្មីៗ•	ធ្វើរបាយការទៅសាមីប្រធាន ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ •	ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផលសេវាកម្មថ្មីៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដល់ ភ្នាក់ងារ និងអតិថិជន
Job Requirement: - និស្សិតបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សា ឬ កំពុងសិក្សាចាប់ពីឆ្នាំទី ២ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ/គ្រង់គ្រង ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ2.	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ១ ឆ្នាំ លើផ្នែកលក់ ឬ ស្ថាប័នហិរញ្ញវត្ថុត្រូវបានផ្ដល់អតិភាព 3.	មានឆន្ទៈតស៊ូ ទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ ព្រមទាំងមានអប្បកិរិយា និងអត្តចរឹកល្អ ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង 4.	មានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន និង អាចធ្វើដំណើរឆ្ងាយក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិរបស់ខ្លួនបាន

job title: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិផ្នែកលក់​( ក្រចេះ  ស្វាយរៀង ស្ទឹងត្រែង ត្បូងឃ្មុំ)
position: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិផ្នែកលក់​( ក្រចេះ  ស្វាយរៀង ស្ទឹងត្រែង ត្បូងឃ្មុំ)
Job Description: •	អនុវត្តតាមផែនការ និង គោលដៅដែលសាមីប្រធានបានផ្តល់ឲ្យ•	គ្រប់គ្រង និង រៀបចំគម្រោងផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃសម្រាប់ការចុះជួបភ្នាក់ងារ លី ហួរ វេលុយ ក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិរបស់ខ្លួន•	បង្រៀននិងបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលដល់ភ្នាក់ងារពីរបៀបក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនវេរលុយ (mPOS) ព្រមទាំងផលិតផលនិងសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន •	រៀបចំផែនការជ្រើសរើសភ្នាក់ងារថ្មីៗ នៅក្នុងតំបន់យុទ្ធសាស្ត្រសំខាន់ៗដែលបានដាក់ចេញពីសាមីប្រធាន និងជាគោលដៅរួមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន•	ប្រមូលនូវរាល់ពត៌មានពីទីផ្សារ និង អតិថិជនដើម្បីស្វែងរកដំណោះស្រាយនិងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រថ្មីៗ•	ធ្វើរបាយការទៅសាមីប្រធាន ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ •	ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផលសេវាកម្មថ្មីៗរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដល់ ភ្នាក់ងារ និងអតិថិជន
Job Requirement: - និស្សិតបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សា ឬ កំពុងសិក្សាចាប់ពីឆ្នាំទី ២ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ/គ្រង់គ្រង ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ2.	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ១ ឆ្នាំ លើផ្នែកលក់ ឬ ស្ថាប័នហិរញ្ញវត្ថុត្រូវបានផ្ដល់អតិភាព 3.	មានឆន្ទៈតស៊ូ ទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ ព្រមទាំងមានអប្បកិរិយា និងអត្តចរឹកល្អ ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង 4.	មានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន និង អាចធ្វើដំណើរឆ្ងាយក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិរបស់ខ្លួនបាន

Job Description:
- Manage projects to run smoothly
- Collect all information and project requirement from client
- Coordinate with cross departments
- Update changes of project between client and team
- Monitor quality and deadline of project
- Meeting with Finance, Risk, Sale, Marketing and QA or relate department by making sure they agree with all
- Requirement in project
- Follow up with development team of project status
- Training to all department to understand about process of project
- Checking with internal team with technology used to develop in project
- Design project flow of process
- Project planning and check quality of project with testers
- Initiate better internal processes

job title: Cash Advance Officer (មន្ត្រីបុរេប្រទាន)
position: Cash Advance Officer (មន្ត្រីបុរេប្រទាន)
Job Description: •	ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់អតិថិជន និងសាធារណៈជន•	ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនគោលដៅ•	រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ និងប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•	សិក្សានិងវាយតម្លៃទៅលើសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន•	បំពេញបែបបទ និងសំណុំឯកសារផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងជាមួយសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន•	រៀបចំឯកសារសំណើសុំឥណទានដាក់ជូនគណៈកម្មការដើម្បីអនុម័តឥណទាន•	ផ្ដល់ជូនព័ត៌មានទាក់ទងជាមួយសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន នៅពេលដែលគណៈកម្មការឥណទានមានចម្ងល់•	ធ្វើការជូនដំណឹងដល់អតិថិជនពីថ្ងៃបើកប្រាក់ និងបង់ប្រាក់•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាអតិថិជនដែលសងកម្ចីយឺតយ៉ាវ•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហារបស់អតិថិជនទាក់ទងជាមួយនឹងឥណទាន•	គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារឥណទាន•	ធ្វើររបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្ទាល់•	ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការស្នើសុំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement: •	មានសញ្ញាបត្រ ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែក ធនាគារ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គណនេយ្យ គ្រប់គ្រង ទីផ្សារ ឬជំនាញប្រហាក់ប្រហែល•	ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារដែលទាក់ទងជាមួយវិស័យធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬវិស័យស្រដៀងយ៉ាងតិច ៦ខែ•	ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ•	ត្រូវមានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនៅក្នុងក្រុមការងារ និងសាធារណៈជន•	មានភាពឯករាជ្យក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ និងសេចក្ដីសម្រេចចិត្ត•	ត្រូវមានមធ្យោបាយធ្វើដំណើរផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន•	អាចចុះបំពេញបេសកកម្មការងារនៅតាមបណ្ដារខេត្តផ្សេងៗ ក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា•	មានចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រច្បាស់លាស់ ជាពិសេស កម្មវិធី Ms.Outlook, Ms. Power Point, Ms.Excel និង Ms. Word

Job Description:
•  Assist the property manager in managing security, landscaping, cleaning, and maintenance teams to ensure the safety and welfare of the residents in our housing complex.
•  Work closely with customers to receive their constructive feedback and deal with their complaints related to construction quality, security, etc. 
•  Assist in reviewing existing operational practices in Property Management Department; propose appropriate changes for improvement where necessary.
•  Oversee the inspection of all the vacant property units and ensure that the units are ready for handover to customers.
•  Supervise and ensure property units are handed over to customers on time and in good quality.
•  Prepare housing unit handover reports for property manager.
•  Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•  At least 3 years of experience in property management and/or construction, or a related area.
•  Knowledge of construction
•  Knowledge of business models and strategy
•  Intermediate level in Excel and PowerPoint 
•  Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•  Strong interpersonal skills
•  Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
•  Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•  Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
Now we are looking for a system operator who will play a central role in system operating and supporting. As a member of our dynamic, agile team, you will have influence on deploying, operating to ensure the system works well 24/7 as well as support fixing and resolving errors/problems timely:

-	Cooperate to test, deploy and operate the system. 
-	Support partner in system connection/integration as well as supporting related units to check and find out errors/problem about software/hardware/network...
-	Develop and carry out information security plans and policies
-	Develop strategies to respond to and recover from a security breach
-	Implement tools to assist in detection, prevention and analysis of security threats
-	Awareness training of the workforce on information security standards, policies and best practices
-	Implement protections, patching on Applications, Systems, and Devices.
-	Installation and use of firewalls, data encryption and other security products and procedures
-	Conduct periodic network scans to find any vulnerability
-	Conduct penetration testing, simulating an attack on the system to find exploitable weaknesses
-	Monitor networks and systems for security breaches, through the use of software that detects intrusions and anomalous system behavior
-	Investigate security breaches
-	Lead incident response, including steps to minimize the impact and then conducting a technical and forensic investigation into how the breach happened and the extent of the damage.
Job Requirement: ** SKILL & REQUIREMENT FOR SYSTEM OPERATOR-	Have bachelor / engineer in IT, computer science or equivalent-	Have more 2 years of working experiences in the same position.-	Have good knowledge in Window Server and Open Sources Operating System (Linux Redhat, CentOS, Ubuntu...)-	Have good knowledge in security (domain controller, antivirus, iptables...)-	Have good knowledge in networking (configuration switch, Firewall, Load Banlancer, ...)-	Have experiences in working with database (Oracle, MySQL, SQL, PostgreSQL ...)-	Be proactive at work, good at teamwork-	Be flexible, honestly, hard-working, be able to work under pressure and high responsibility-	Be able to learn and research more about new technology-	Be fluent in English listening, speaking, reading and writing.** Priority points (be nice to have):+	Have ability Teamwork, careful, attention to detail, logical thinking and always want to develop themselves+	Have knowledge, understanding or experience working on one of bank / finance / payment / e wallet field.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall, Aeon Mall Phnom Penh, Aeon Mall Sen Sok City N/A

Job Description:
Operations Management

Run the Operation Department
Assign teams, establish work processes, and monitor staff performance to ensure customer satisfaction
Set minimum standards for operations group to achieve in work flow processes (e.g., FCR issuance, doc dispatch, PSA and SA transmittal, etc.) Ensure teams handle their assignments in prompt, thorough, and accurate fashion (i.e., ensure staff provides qual
Oversee day to day operations, help resolve problems, and assist staff with difficult issues
Help ensure smooth working relationship with all vendors, agents and service providers
Handle those daily messages which require a higher level of experience and/or English proficiency
Assist staff to correctly interpret and execute customers’ instructions and working procedures
Ensure work processes (data, documentation) of operations group effectively meet company’s internal financial/accounting requirements

Staff Management
Influence and/or recommend hire/fire decisions
Ensure new staff is trained effectively; develop staff for growth and new responsibilities
Monitor staff performance; conduct annual performance reviews
Cross train staff to broaden their skills and to provide quality back up during vacation or sick leave
Encourage and motivate staff to achieve peak performance
Influence and/or recommend staff salary decisions
Set positive example for staff
Monitor staff performance against management standards (e.g. FCR issuance, doc dispatch, etc.). Continuously seek to improve these standards

Assist in developing business plan and/or pricing schemes for new business opportunities (as needed)
Assist in management/operations of non-traditional services as needed
Provide special reports and analysis as requested by management (as needed)
Provide problem resolution as directed by Management
Optimise human and other resources; demonstrate expense control
Ensure staff properly handles invoicing and other key administrative tasks
Provide quality customer services

Set example for all staff to follow in providing quality service to both external and internal customers (e.g., Accounting Dept.)
Provide prompt, through and accurate response to all queries from customers or Century-U.S.  Ensure staff does same
Provide value-added services for customers
Ensure customer’s satisfaction with our services
Act as liaison with Century’s overseas offices and agents where necessary
Ensure staff members use good telephone manners and communicate in helpful, proactive fashion
Ensure proactive, accurate, and timely communication is provided to consignee and Century–U.S.
Data Management

Supervise and train staff to ensure data accuracy and integrity
Monitor staff performance in meeting data standards (PSA and SA transmittal/accuracy, etc.).
Ensure customers understand reasons for any revisions or problem data
Assist with new systems implementation (where necessary)
Sales

Maintain close ties to vendor community in efforts to build customer satisfaction and to maximize business opportunities
Visit important vendors, buying offices, trading companies and Far East offices of current and target customers as needed to maintain good rapport and Century name recognition
Sales, hospitality, and/or assistance for all customers or prospective customers travelling through the Region
Maintain close ties to Shipping community and keep abreast of current events
Assist customers in developing their logistics strategies or with cost analysis
Other works arranged by Manager or Supervisor
Job Requirement:
Extensive business experience within Supply Chain/Logistics or a combination of Merchandising and Supply Chain roles an asset
Education and/or work experience overseas is preferable
Ability to work in a time sensitive environment and be results driven
Ability to embrace and adapt to change with a positive attitude
Excellent interpersonal and globally adaptable communication skills
Use English well
Fluency in Chinese is an asset

Company Profile:
At foodpanda, we're on a mission to redefine how food, people, culture and tech are connected. Our panda family consists of problem solvers, designers and thinkers, working around the clock to make foodpanda the most powerful online tool for food convenience in the universe- and we’re just getting started!

Job Description:
-    Work closely with brand marketing leads to develop strongly differentiated value propositions and drive product adoption with a deep understanding of the local market and local consumer insights 
-    Be responsible for the end-to-end design and execution of strategic campaigns including concept ideation, media planning, go-to-market strategy, pitch deck to merchants and budget planning
-    Work with all key stakeholders and supporting functions (internal and external) to deliver high-quality work to meet the timeline
-    Support the development and planning of consumer marketing & campaign strategy to ensure business and brand’s objectives are met
-    Project: handle end to end projects efficiently and timely, based on the budget given
-    Strategy: understand the market, where we can meet our potential target through vendor branding, acquire new customers, meet business and growth KPIs
-   Creativity: coordinate the creation of brand compliant assets, brief creatives, source and bring to life your ideas
-    Work closely across functions and with Regional team to drive brand Marketing initiatives in Cambodia
-    Work cross-functionally, both internally with our in-house creative teams and with external service providers
-    Liaise with Regional suppliers, procurements, and HQ marketing team to find efficient sourcing solutions for our markets, including flyers, merchandise, restaurant marketing materials 
-    Maintain spreadsheets (databases and project plans), prepare guidelines and decks to make sure all information is well-recorded and up-to-date
-    Analyze campaign performance in end-of-campaign reports, with results, key outcomes and learnings
-  Support with regular competitor analysis and study marketing trends
-    Other duties assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
-    2-5 years experience in branding
-    Bachelor Degree in Business, Marketing or related area
-    Experience in FMCG, Retail Business, E-Commerce, Advertising agency

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
To report to Building Manager, this role’s responsibilities include:
• Ensure all owners, tenants, contractors and building users are provided with the information and guides required. 
• Regularly update owners / tenants regarding any on-going building work; to receive comments, suggestions or complaints. 
• To monitor and review the operation of all term service sub-contractors such as cleaning, security, pest control, landscape and lift contractors, as well as to ensure that those services are performed satisfactorily as agreed to in the contract and at the costs quoted. 
• To ensure the smooth daily operation of the building such as car park, vehicular and pedestrian access and security etc. 
• Follow up on any comments, suggestions or complaints until the matter is resolved. 
• Carry out regular building inspections and view from the client perspective. Report any issues or abnormalities to the Property Manager with a recommendation for improvement. 
• Perform other related tasks as assigned by the supervisor
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENTS:

1. Bachelor’s degree in any related field 
2. Male, minimum 21- years old   
3. Minimum 1 years’ work experience, property related work experience preferential 
4. Good appearance and personal presentation  
5. Service-orientated 
6. Good English communication both in verbal and written 
7. Good computer skill 
8. Able to work on weekends (Days off will be arranged during weekdays)

Salary: Negotiate

Location: Beungkok, Sangkat Sraschork, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh.

Working Hours
- Shift 1: 6am to 3pm
- Shift 2: 2:30pm to 10:30pm

Benefits:
- Leaves (AL, Sick Leave, Special Leave...)
- Public Holiday( Follow Cambodian Labor Law)
- Lunch Allowance
- NSSF
- Provide OT
- Seniority Pay
- Career development

៧. ត្រូវពាក់ឯកសណ្ឋានសំអាតជានិច្ច
8. Communicate with guests in polite and sincere manner adhere to standards operation procedures.
៨. ផ្តល់ការទាក់ទងជាមួយភ្ញៀវដោយរក្សាបាននូវភាពសមរម្យនិងថ្លៃថ្នូរ
9. Other work which assign by department head
៩. កិច្ចការផ្សេងស្នើរសុំដោយប្រធានផ្នែក

According to the operation strategy, formulate periodic goals and plans, precipitate suitable and efficient operation processes and methods, coordinate the implementation of various departments, and ensure the realization of the platform's user volume, retention rate, activity and user conversion goals;4. Analyze user behavior, mine data, continuously adjust and optimize operations, and collaborate with product and development teams to continuously improve user experience;5. Responsible for the daily management of the platform team and the construction of talent echelon, build a team with combat effectiveness, and help team members grow rapidly;6. Promote smooth communication between the various departments of the platform and the headquarters and companies, such as system empowerment, product training, transaction assurance, etc.
Job Requirement: More than 2 years of used car trading/Internet car platform operation experience and related marketing management experience, aged 35-45;2. Have a keen insight into the industry trends and market models of used car to be trading, and have strong project management capabilities;3. Proficient in product planning and marketing of Internet used car trading platforms, with experience in market research and analysis, brand planning and promotion, and familiar with online platform traffic data analysis, customer experience analysis and other processes;4. Have strong logical analysis and data analysis capabilities, and be good at promoting workflow optimization;5. Strong self-motivation, sense of responsibility, sense of purpose, good pressure resistance, willing to grow and develop together with the company.6. Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

job title: Farm Manager-ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
position: Farm Manager-ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
Job Description:
- Planning, management and profitability of the Operations Unit, accountabilities include winning and executing projects, staffing for operations department and other managerial functions
- Assists in the annual preparation of sales projections, expense budgets, and capital expenditure budgets
- Plans, organizes and directs all departments at the Operations unit level, responsible for achievement of overall company objectives
- Provides technical and administrative expertise and support for specific operations
- Liaison between the projects, other department and CEO 
- Ultimately responsible for managing operations people and resources, and the profit/loss performance of the Operations
- Develop and recommend annual operating and capital budget for the operations group, report on actual results against plan, implement and execute plans approved by CEO
- Develop and achieve positive operating statements and performance graphs having goals and targets, as per company objectives
- Direct all contracts with a hands-on approach to the day-to-day activities of the division
- Develop and implement strategic plans for contracts ensuring that all goals are either achieved or better with an emphasis upon service delivery
- Effectively manage all activities with regards to operations, construction, staff, quality, health and safety and business planning
- Hold regular review meetings with the staff in developing a proactive focus upon quality, overheads, manpower, programming, organization and delivery aspects
- Ensure a high level of teamwork and cohesion between all levels of staff
- Report on ongoing issues keeping them informed of any potential problems that could affect the business
- Manage day-today operation of the business ensure everything run smoothly
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s degree in related field such as Management, Sales & Marketing or Finance 
- Minimum 5 years working experience in the managerial levels in the mentioned area and or related
- Honest, highly responsible and reliable
- Good computer literacy (Internet and Email, Ms. Word, Excel)
- Ability to manage multi-tasks
- Proven management skills and ability to negotiate effectively with partners 
- Knowledge of data analysis and financial assessment 
- Proficient in English speaking, report writing and presentation
- Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful, high commitment, competence and motivation

BENEFIT	: Accommodation, Food, Insurance, and other attractive benefits. 
SALARY	: Competitive 

· Take vital sign examination and adjusted wound treatment
· Help with basic clinical examination 
· Help with giving basic medication and support in health emergency 
· Refer patients to partner hospital/clinic occasionally accompanying patient in vehicle transportation to hospital/clinic if necessary.
· Make request for medical supplies to refill first aid kit/medical stock 
· Refer positive patient for treatment at government health institutions 
· Provide education/training on health care matter to staff/students during outbreak of disease occasionally.
· Assist translation for expats relating to consultation etc.
· Check and give advice on disinfection, healthy, safety and hygiene especially infection control.  
· Record medical register
· Maintain patient file/related documents for doctor’s reference
· Maintain and check medical supplies stock
· Make medical order to refill medical stock 
· Attend bi-weekly and monthly meeting
· Make medical report on monthly basis
· Taking care and regular control of the infrastructure of the clinic or get the responsible person to repair it
· Check-up nutritional status and average condition of children
· Be on call if needed  
· Willing to learn and educate in a new environment
· Perform any other responsibilities as assigned by their supervisor.
Job Requirement:
·	Graduated secondary/bachelor’s degree of nursing school
·	At least 2 years’ experience as a nurse
·	He/she has registered and valid license from C.C.N 
·	Good communication in written and spoken English and Khmer language  
·	Computer literacy
·	Being sympathetic, care, and willing to relief sickness/suffering from other
·	Interpersonal skill and communication skill
·	Being sympathetic, care, and willing to relief sickness/suffering from other
·	Enjoy and Love working with children 
·	Willing to learn and educate in a new environment

Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

Job Description: • To ensure effective utilization of warehouse loading, unloading, stocking, and safekeeping of items to maintain the quality of finished goods in order to prevent product damage and avoid the occurrence of pilferage, accidents, and occupational hazards.• Effectively monitor flow of goods and implements first- In First- Out (FIFO) methods in the use of raw materials and dispatching of finished goods.• To coordinates with the procurement department with regards to incoming deliveries of raw materials and supplies.• To coordinates with production, packaging, and distribution with regards to transfer and dispatch of finished goods.• To effectively prepare and monitor the forklift team supporting to the production side.• To effectively prepare and monitor the Warehouse team to issue finished goods to transport agents, make sure 100% OTIF and Zero complaints.• Be initiative of hazardous point protection proposal to management inside the warehouse and distribution operation.• To ensure accuracy of product inventories against system records by conducting cycle counts on a periodic basis following appropriate guidelines by accounting and audit departments• To conducts regular cycle count as per established schedules and guidelines. Evaluates and analyze inventory variance. Implements preventive countermeasures based on the result of inventory variance analysis. • To resolve inventory discrepancies in coordination with the accounting department. • To ensure the integrity and completeness of logistics records and manuals• To provide clear directions and general guidance to the department in the formulation of standard operating procedures. • To plan and optimize warehouse and distribution products to meet Key Performance Indicators and cost-efficiency.• To initiate, execute or participate in suitable action where necessary to improve logistics operations.• To develop and train warehouse personnel from time to time on safety, warehouse, and distribution competencies to enhance the knowledge.• Be possible to operate a forklift to support operations base on the real situation.• To do other related tasks required by superior Management.• To work effectively and efficiently to comply with the quality management system ISO 9001 and food safety management system ISO 22000 requirement.
Job Requirement: • Education: Preferably Bachelor level of Business Management, Logistics/ Supply Chain.• Experiences: Minimum 2 years of experience (preferable in the manufacturing industry) and managing of people related to warehouse and distribution management.• Skills: Leadership, effective communication, result-oriented, 5S and Health & Safety, SAP.

Job Description:
•	Manage the setup and daily operations of an academic school - School of English & Foundation/ School of Computing & Information Systems/ School of Business Management/ School of Postgraduate Studies. 
•	Liaise with Head office in Singapore for all academic and operational matters for effective delivery of the degree courses.
•	Liaise with the local MoEYS for compliance, approval and adjustments of existing and delivery of new courses.
•	Supervise and train the teaching faculty on EAMU’s Way of teaching, smooth conduct of classes, assessments and activities to support good academic performance
•	Manage the proper record of student attendance, conduct and individual performance for intervention strategy to achieve maximum progressions and completion of courses.
•	Manage the activities of both pre- and post- stages of each teaching semester, including course planning, resources management and class scheduling
•	Develop and collaborate with local businesses and communities for enhancements of our programmes, including establishing internships and career opportunities.
•	Set up the training centres, if required, to support the academic courses so that our students gain practical skills to make them employment ready. 
•	Develop and coordinate with our existing and potential overseas university partner and QA associations for validation or accreditation of courses.
•	Teach to understand the learning environment of our students and faculty so as to adopt initiatives to enhance their learning experience.
•	*HOS (Postgraduate studies) is expected to possess expertise to establish an institute of research and create support system for all research student’s in their supervision and defense of their thesis.
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum a Master qualification in the relevant fields. PhD for HOS (Postgraduate studies) application. 
•	At least 3 years’ experience as Head of academic school at the university level
•	At least 5 years of teaching experience of related subjects at university level
•	Strong network of teaching and research faculty
•	Fluent in English. You are expected to communicate daily in English
•	Highly competent in teaching pedagogy and assessment methods.  
•	Possess good computer skills (MS Office - Word, Excel, Powerpoint etc.) 
•	Strong work ethics, responsible and a passion for teaching.
Benefits to employee:
•	We offer a highly competitive benefit packages with a pleasant working environment. 
•	Salary: Negotiable. Indicate your asking salary in your CV.
•	Position: Full time
•	Working hours: Monday to Friday and Saturday (alternate OFF)
•	Annual Bonus
•	Private Insurance – Hospitalisation cover
•	Annual Leave
•	Medical and Dental cover

* How to apply?
- Interested applicants are requested to submit a cover letter with CV and a recent passport size photo and salary expectation via email to EAMU at career@eamu.edu.kh. Transcripts and other supporting documents are to be included in the application.
We regret that only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile: East Asia Management University (EAMU) is an international university from Singapore that is licensed and authorised by the Royal Government of Cambodia to deliver university programs and courses for the benefits of the nation’s human capital developments. The University is currently hiring suitable and qualified candidates to fill both academic and non-academic positions.

job title: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម មានតួនាទីជួយសម្រួលការងារក្នុងផ្នែកដូចជា៖
- ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើការវិភាគសំណើពីអ្នកស្នើរសុំ
- វិភាគទីផ្សារ និងស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ប្រៀបធៀប និងវិភាគសំនើរដែលបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ចរចារកិច្ចសន្យាព្រមព្រៀងតម្លៃ និង​ធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ
- តាមដានលើការបញ្ជាទិញដែលនាំមកនូវគុណភាព និង សេវាកម្ម
- និងរៀបចំឯកសារនិងរបាយការណ៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
- ស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដែលមានសក្កានុភាព
- ប្រៀបធៀប និងប៉ាន់ស្មានបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ស្វែងយល់ពីលក្ខខណ្ឌនៃការដឹកជញ្ចូនទំនិញ និងការទូទាត់
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពនៃទំនិញដែលបានបញ្ជាទិញ
- ធានាអោយបាននូវការកត់ត្រាថ្មីៗនៃទំនិញដែលបានទិញ ពត៌មានការដឹកជញ្ជូន និងវិក័យបត្រ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍លើការបញ្ជាទិញ រួមបញ្ចូលទាំងការវិភាគថ្លៃដើម
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យកម្រិតស្តុក
- ផ្តល់ពត៌មាននៃការអភិវឌ្ឍថ្មីៗក្នុងការិយាល័យបញ្ជាទិញដូចជាការប្រែប្រួលតម្លៃ លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌទីផ្សារ និងផលិតផលថ្មីៗ
- រក្សាតារាងដេញថ្លៃ ឯកសារតម្លៃទំនិញ ឯកសារអាជីវកម្ម និងឯកសារវិភាគសំណើរផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការសម្រាប់ប្រតិបត្តិការដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពនៃការងារបញ្ជាទិញ
- បង្កើតPO ក្នុងប្រពន្ធ័អេឡិចត្រូនិច NAV
- រៀបចំបែបបទនិងឯកសារនៃការបញ្ជាទិញ និងបញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកគនេយ្យដើម្បីធ្វើការទូទាត់ជូនអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- គោរពគោលការណ៏ និងអនុវត្តន៏ក្រមនិតិវិធីនៃការបញ្ជាទិញអោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមដែលថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងផ្តល់អោយធ្វើ

Qualification (គុណវុឌ្ឍិដែលត្រូវការ):
• កម្រិតសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រពាណិជ្ជកម្ម រដ្ឋបាល គ្រប់គ្រង ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើរ
• មានបទពិសោធន៌ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធយ៉ាងតិច ៦ ខែ

Personal Characteristics (បុគ្គលិកលក្ខិណៈផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន):

Job Description:
Personal Assistant is responsible for performing secretarial work and provide senior managers with day-to-day administrative support. The duties include answering phone calls and managing correspondence, scheduling appointments, and making travel arrangements. The duties may also be required to organize events.

I. Job Description:
- Assist the Executive Director in the timely management of communications including written, telephone, email, and voicemail.
- Support the Executive Director by providing a high standard of personal executive level assistance to meet the needs of the Executive Director’s objectives, including a significant amount of diary management, setting up meetings, hospitality, travel, and visa arrangements.
- Manage and coordinate travel for both business and personal arrangements.
- Implementing and maintaining procedures/administrative systems.
- Managing internal and external correspondence on behalf of senior management.
- Preparing communications on behalf of senior management.
- Support in coordination of projects by capturing timelines, strategies, and delivering progress updates.
- Other tasks as assigned by Executive Director.
Job Requirement:
- Previous experience in a customer engagement, Personal Assistant, Secretary or similar role.
- Creative problem solving, outstanding organizational, and time management skills.
- Ability to speak effectively among executives, clients, customers, and employees.
- Ability to resolve complex administrative problems independently and perform other tasks that are diverse and advanced.
- Can speak Thai is a plus.
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Company Profile: The Sauber Group is in its core a Cambodian company and proud of its roots. As it is also a joint venture between Cambodia, Thailand and Germany, it will stress the strengths of each culture to create a unique company culture.The company credo is to turn standard processes and services into outstanding experiences for our customers. It clearly targets to disrupt markets and to grow aggressively and profitable.Sauber aims to become a conglomerate of businesses which can be aggressively multiplied all over Cambodia. Ultimately, the target is to go public with a strong and recognized brand.At the core of the business is the idea to connect traditional trade with E Commerce in a multi-channel system. Classical market approaches such as the development of Sauber Mini Malls are combined with alternative sales channels like E commerce, direct sales for B2B and telesales. With Cambodia as its home base, it is the target to expand into other countries in the region as well when the conditions are right.

position: Customer Relationship Officer (មន្ត្រីបុរេប្រទាន)
Job Description: •	ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់អតិថិជន និងសាធារណៈជន•	ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនគោលដៅ•	រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ និងប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•	សិក្សានិងវាយតម្លៃទៅលើសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន•	បំពេញបែបបទ និងសំណុំឯកសារផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងជាមួយសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន•	រៀបចំឯកសារសំណើសុំឥណទានដាក់ជូនគណៈកម្មការដើម្បីអនុម័តឥណទាន•	ផ្ដល់ជូនព័ត៌មានទាក់ទងជាមួយសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន នៅពេលដែលគណៈកម្មការឥណទានមានចម្ងល់•	ធ្វើការជូនដំណឹងដល់អតិថិជនពីថ្ងៃបើកប្រាក់ និងបង់ប្រាក់•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាអតិថិជនដែលសងកម្ចីយឺតយ៉ាវ•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហារបស់អតិថិជនទាក់ទងជាមួយនឹងឥណទាន•	គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារឥណទាន•	ធ្វើររបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្ទាល់•	ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការស្នើសុំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement: •	មានសញ្ញាបត្រ ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែក ធនាគារ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គណនេយ្យ គ្រប់គ្រង ទីផ្សារ ឬជំនាញប្រហាក់ប្រហែល•	ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារដែលទាក់ទងជាមួយវិស័យធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬវិស័យស្រដៀងយ៉ាងតិច ៦ខែ•	ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ•	ត្រូវមានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនៅក្នុងក្រុមការងារ និងសាធារណៈជន•	មានភាពឯករាជ្យក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ និងសេចក្ដីសម្រេចចិត្ត•	ត្រូវមានមធ្យោបាយធ្វើដំណើរផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន•	អាចចុះបំពេញបេសកកម្មការងារនៅតាមបណ្ដារខេត្តផ្សេងៗ ក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា•	មានចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រច្បាស់លាស់ ជាពិសេស កម្មវិធី Ms.Outlook, Ms. Power Point, Ms.Excel និង Ms. Word

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Reviewing IT audit planning, define key risk concerns, and conduct IT internal audit mission with IT IAO
• Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit as well as full support to the IT IAO
• Supervision and monitoring of IT audit works performed by the team members and consolidate IT internal audit report
• Maximizing effectiveness of the IT audit results through participation in the management meeting – debriefing
• Actively involved in controlling the IT department under own responsibilities with respect to risks management, cost control management, business and controls risks – any particular worrying issues pertaining to these should be brought to the attention of the IAD/IT IAM, then meeting with MJQ’s senior management for solutions
• Provide training to the team members when deem necessary, provide effective coaching to ensure effective knowledge exchange and internal audit quality in its process and output
• Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its status be tracked against individual IT audit plan – audit commencement date, completion date of the IT audit field works, meeting notes etc.
• Ensure that all IT working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit testing procedures etc.
• Assist to design IT IA policy, procedure and guideline for IT IA team to implement effectively
• Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes
• Ensure suggestions for more efficient and effective identification/IT audit procedures of material gaps under area of responsibilities
• Identify the weaknesses and risks in IT infra-structure, servers and database.
• Provide security best practice to IT Infra-structure, servers and database to prevent security breaches.
• Initiate internal controls document to ensure key risk in IT department are identifying and testing.
• Other tasks assigned by the IAD/IT IAM
Job Requirement:
• A minimum university degree in IT. IIA understanding or Master of IT degree is an advantage.
• About 1 years of experience in the leadership role or 3 years of experience of IT audit
• At least 3 years of IT audit experience (Information system governance, Infra-structure security, severs security hardening, database security hardening)
• Certified Ethical Hacker is preferred.
• Knowledge of Information Technologies Standard Framework.
• Good analysis and troubleshooting system in Firewall
• Knowledge of database and software for query report such as SQL, VBA,… is an advantage
• Knowledge of IT and system project is preferable
• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings
• Good written and spoken English, as well as communication and interpersonal skills
• High motivation and ability to work without supervision.

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Do data collection and draft planning including sampling of a department and submit for Sr. Internal Audit Officer review
• Conduct internal audit mission at a department and ensure high quality of the audit conduct
• Provide immediate recommendation as the result of both the compliances, risk and operational audits
• Draft internal audit report on own findings and report to the Sr. CIAO and communicate findings to auditee for comments
• Ensure constant capacity building and up-to-date of company group’s performance
• Focus on functions at campus level such as Aii Academic Services, Aii Academic Support Services, AIS Academic Support Services, Athletic Department, AIS Study Program, Support Services (Bursar, Administrative Office, Information Office, MJQ Library, MJQ Student Health Center, School Bus Services…) and so on.
• Other tasks required by the IAD/CIAS/Sr. CIAO.
Job Requirement:
• University degree in banking/finance, accounting, business or economics, preferably a specialized accounting degree.
• At least 1 year of experience in internal audit position or at least 2 years of experience of finance/account in the microfinance/banking/audit sector
• Good understanding of internal control and practices
• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings
• The ability to use your own initiative
• Analytical thinking and attention to detail
• The ability to work effectively on your own and as part of a team
• Strong ethical standard and high levels of integrity
• Resilience under pressure
• Flexible thinking and ability to adapt to change
• Strong advance excel skill.


**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖

• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
- Creative Design on social media content artwork and video production
- Reviewing final layout and suggesting improvements if required.
- Assist on all marketing communication activities such as writing copy for all collaterals included promotional literature, brochures, leaflet, digital marketing, newsletters, and others.
- Monitor and coordinate the process for product demo, promotion, or any events.
- Liaising with external printers, suppliers on a regular basis to ensure deadlines.
- Promote company products and executes other task assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Design , Business Administration or marketing or other related fields
- 1-2 Years experience working as a graphic designer
- Good Communication
- Able to work with AI, Photoshop, Illustrator , design tool, ability to do photo and video editing is a plus
- Knowledge and understanding in social media platform.
- Good Time management skill and able to complete within deadline
- Knowledge or understanding of agriculture/ infrastructure equipment product is a plus.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description: Internal/External Interactions:   - Internal   • Reports to Talent Acquisition Manager    • All Units in MJQE - External   • Recruitment agency, supplier and so on   • University, NGOs and so on involve with education development programFunctional Responsibilities: - Coordinate with hiring managers to identify staffing needs - Determine selection criteria - Source potential candidates through online channels (e.g. social platforms and    professional networks) - Plan interview and selection procedures, including screening calls, assessments and in-    person interviews - Assess candidate information, including resumes and contact details - Prepared offer letter employment contract and other requirement document for new staff - Design job descriptions and interview questions that reflect each position’s    requirements - Lead employer branding initiatives - Organize and attend job fairs and recruitment events   Forecast quarterly and annual hiring needs by department - Foster long-term relationships with past applicants and potential candidates - Other tasks assigned by line manager.Travel Requirements:  - This position is based in head office. At times the position is scheduled to work in Units and regional level.
Job Requirement: - 03+ years’ experience as a Senior Talent Acquisition Officer or similar role- Familiarity with social media, resume databases and professional networks- Hands-on experience with full-cycle recruiting using various interview techniques and   evaluation methods- General knowledge of various employment laws and practices- Attention to detail about Application Tracking Database- Excellent verbal and written communication skills- A keen understanding of the differences between various roles within organizations.- Achieving Results – Results driven, able to make sound judgments over competing   priorities, use initiative and actively assess the course of action to set and   accomplish targets.- Strategic Thinking – Able to identify a vision along with the plans which need to be   implemented to meet the end goal, evaluating situations, decisions, issues in the short,   medium and long term.- Analytical Thinking – Able to simplify complex problems, processes or projects into   component parts and explore and evaluate them systematically.  - Flexibility – Adapts easily to change and responds flexibly to a changing and evolving   environment, provides momentum when driving change and involves others when building   plans for change.- Resilience - Ability to work under pressure and manage personal effectiveness in face of   challenge.  Demonstrates an approach to work that is characterized by commitment, energy   and motivation.- Teamwork – Able to build and maintain effective working relationships with a diverse and   multi-cultural workforce in a variety of locations, working cooperatively with others.    The ability to build and contribute to a team as well as work independently within a   given framework.- Communication – Strong communication, influencing and presentation skills both verbal   and written.  Able to get one’s message understood by adopting a range of styles, tools   and techniques appropriate to the audience.

Job Description: - Welcomes patients and visitors by greeting patients and visitors, in person or on the telephone, answering or referring inquires.- Keeps patient appointments on schedule by notifying provider of patient’s arrival; reviewing service delivery compared to schedule; reminding provider of service delays. - Comforts patients by anticipating patients’ anxieties, answering patients’ questions, maintaining the reception area.- Ensures availability of treatment information by filing and retrieving patient records.- Maintains patient accounts by obtaining, recording, and updating personal and financial information.- Obtains revenue by recording and updating financial information, recording and collecting patient charges; controlling credit extended to patients, filing, collecting.- Maintains business office inventory and equipment by checking stock to determine inventory   level; anticipating needed supplies; placing and expediting orders for supplies; verifying receipt of supplies; scheduling equipment service and repairs.- Protects patients’ rights by maintaining confidentiality of personal and financial information. -Maintains operations by following policies and procedures; reporting needed changes.- Other tasks will have assigned by Line Manger

Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations.
• Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.
• Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.
• Observe and interpret patient’s symptoms and communicate them to physicians.
• Recording patient’s vital signs and medication information and fill in patient’s charts.
• Adjust and administer patient’s medication and provide treatments according to physician’s order.
• Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc…).
• Provide instant medical care in emergencies.
• Check and maintain nursing supplies.
